import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import employerLogo from"../images/bs logo.jpg";import shadows from"@mui/material/styles/shadows";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const JobEmployers=()=>{const[windowWidth,setWindowWidth]=useState(window.innerWidth);// Update window width on resize

const employers=[{logo:employerLogo,company:"Unique Saints Design"},{logo:employerLogo,company:"BlinkStar Designs"},{logo:employerLogo,company:"Kilar Novels"},{logo:employerLogo,company:"Mandy Investments"},{logo:employerLogo,company:"Proverb Tech"},{logo:employerLogo,company:"Blessy Fashions"}];// Responsive styles based on window width
